title: Main import partners for Japan 2017
summary: This statistic shows the percentage of worldwide total to Japan in 2017 , sorted 2017 Country .
It was found that 4.1 % of global Japan total were from Saudi_Arabia , whereas approximately one quarter of total to the search platform came from the China .
gold: The statistic shows the main import partners for Japan in 2017 . In 2017 , Japan 's main import partner was China , accounting for 24.5 percent of all imports .
